trans-unit.source: Provides initialization settings for a <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlWriter"></xref> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 提供初始化設定<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlWriter"></xref>實作。

trans-unit.source: XamlWriterSettings is a class for settings that are used by a <xref:System.Xaml.XamlWriter>; however, XamlWriterSettings does not hold any specific settings.
trans-unit.target: XamlWriterSettings 是所使用的設定需類別<xref:System.Xaml.XamlWriter>; 不過，XamlWriterSettings 不包含任何特定的設定。</xref:System.Xaml.XamlWriter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xaml.XamlWriter> constructor does not use this settings class as an argument, nor does any other <xref:System.Xaml.XamlWriter> member use it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xaml.XamlWriter>建構函式不會使用此設定類別，做為引數，也不會任何其他<xref:System.Xaml.XamlWriter>成員使用它。</xref:System.Xaml.XamlWriter> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlWriter>

trans-unit.source: Instead, the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter> and <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriter> classes include their own settings classes as construction arguments; both classes add actual settings and are based on XamlWriterSettings.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，<xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter>和<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriter>類別包括他們自己的設定類別做為建構引數; 這兩個類別加入實際的設定，並根據 XamlWriterSettings。</xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriter> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlWriterSettings"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlWriterSettings"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlWriterSettings"></xref> class using another existing settings instance.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlWriterSettings"></xref>類別使用另一個現有的設定執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor supports the merging of settings, where additional settings can come from other participants in the writer process or from settings classes for specialized writers that override <xref:System.Xaml.XamlWriterSettings>.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式可讓您支援的設定，其中的其他設定可以來自編寫器程序中的其他參與者或設定類別，該覆寫<xref:System.Xaml.XamlWriterSettings>.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlWriterSettings>特製化寫入合併
